body: you are more beloved than you know.
it's okay to not be the best at something.
you have the courage and strength to keep going.
be as kind to yourself as you are to others.
i'm proud of you and everything is going to be great.
you are smart. you are kind. you are important.
nothing good comes fast or easy.
there is nobody else in the world like you.
you are amazing. own that shit.
on the other side of the clouds is a bright blue sky.
forget all of the reasons that it won't work and believe the one reason why it will.
